tool_name: Get City and State for India Pin codes
tool_description: Get the most accurate and latest city and state values for all India Pin codes
title: Get City and State for India Pin codes

api_list.name: https://api.pincodeapi.com/items/{Pincode}
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://get-city-and-state-for-india-pin-codes.p.rapidapi.com/items/110009"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "get-city-and-state-for-india-pin-codes.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
